pkgmetadata.longdescription: DCA Tools for Decline Rate Analysis and EUR Forecast // Arps Decline Curve Analysis (DCA) models for production rate, cumulative production, nominal decline rate, the derivative of loss-ratio, and estimated ultimate recovery (EUR) predictions for oil and gas wells. Arps, J. J. (1945) doi:10.2118/945228-G. Robertson, S. (1988) https://www.onepetro.org/general/SPE-18731-MS.
